quote.text: User interface is the process of shifting from chaotic complexity to elegant simplicity.
quote.author: Akshat Paul

quote.text: The best way to predict the future is to invent it.
quote.author: Alan Kay

quote.text: Fools ignore complexity. Pragmatists suffer it. Some can avoid it. Geniuses remove it.
quote.author: Alan Peris

quote.text: A computer would deserve to be called intelligent if it could deceive a human into believing that it was human.
quote.author: Alan Turing
